text: Wait for end of 15M candle (that made the sweep) and place stop limit order with SL and TP + place alert on high/low of sweep candle (for extended sweep)

text:
Cancel pending limit order. Wait for end of 15M candle and then place new Stop limit order.
(Must meet all previous criteria - be in killzone, proper size of candle, not too close to 4H range, 1:3 RR inside 4H range). Wait for the end of next 15 candle.

label: Next candle after placing limit order swept the entry candle high/low again
text: Cancel pending order and place new one as in previous step

label: Next candle did not trigger the trade nor swept entry candle high/low
text: Cancel pending order and do not trade this direction in this Killzone again. Wait for next Killzone and repeat checklist
